properties.entry: INSERT INTO DSP ( DSP_NO , MEM_NO , DSP_TITLE , NICKNAME , POST_CTG , ISSUE_DATE , LOCATION_NAME , CASE_PHONE , ANIMAL_VARIETY , ANIMAL_GENDER , ANIMAL_AGE , ANIMAL_WEIGHT , ANIMAL_ISSUE , ETC , MONEY ) VALUES ( 'DSP-'||LPAD(SEQ_DSPNO.NEXTVAL,3,0) , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( ATTACH_NO , REF_NO , PATH , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , ATTACH_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL , 'DSP-'||LPAD(SEQ_DSPNO.CURRVAL,3,0) , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT DSP_NO , POST_CTG , DSP_TITLE , MONEY , LOCATION_NAME , ANIMAL_ISSUE , PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM DSP JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (DSP_NO = REF_NO) WHERE POST_STATUS = 'Y' and attach_level = 1 ORDER BY DSP_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE DSP SET VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT+1 WHERE DSP_NO = ? AND POST_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT CHANGE_NAME , PATH , ATTACH_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , ATTACH_LEVEL , ATTACH_STATUS , REF_NO
FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO = ?

SELECT DSP_NO , NICKNAME , DSP_TITLE , WRITE_DATE , VIEW_COUNT , POST_CTG , ISSUE_DATE , LOCATION_NAME , CASE_PHONE , ANIMAL_VARIETY , ANIMAL_GENDER , ANIMAL_AGE , ANIMAL_WEIGHT , ANIMAL_ISSUE , ETC , MONEY , PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG"
FROM DSP JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (DSP_NO = REF_NO)
WHERE DSP_NO = ? and attach_level = 1

SELECT DSP_NO , POST_CTG , DSP_TITLE , MONEY , LOCATION_NAME , ANIMAL_ISSUE , PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM DSP JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (DSP_NO = REF_NO) WHERE POST_STATUS = 'Y' and attach_level = 1 and POST_CTG = ? ORDER BY DSP_NO DESC

SELECT PATH || CHANGE_NAME "CONTENTIMG"
FROM DSP JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (DSP_NO = REF_NO)
WHERE DSP_NO = ? and attach_level = 2

UPDATE DSP SET DSP_TITLE = ? , POST_CTG = ? , ISSUE_DATE = ? , LOCATION_NAME = ? , CASE_PHONE = ? , ANIMAL_VARIETY = ? , ANIMAL_GENDER = ? , ANIMAL_AGE = ? , ANIMAL_WEIGHT = ? , ANIMAL_ISSUE = ? , ETC = ? , MONEY = ? WHERE DSP_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? , CHANGE_NAME = ? , PATH = ? , ATTACH_LEVEL = ? WHERE ATTACH_NO = ?
UPDATE DSP SET POST_STATUS = 'D' WHERE DSP_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM DSP WHERE POST_STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO REPLY ( REPLY_NO , MEM_NO , REF_POST_CTG , CLIST_NO , NICKNAME , REPLY_CONTENT ) VALUES ( 'REPLY-' || LPAD(SEQ_REPLYNO.NEXTVAL,3,'0') , ? , 1 , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT REPLY_NO , R.NICKNAME , TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH:MI') "WRITE_DATE" , REPLY_CONTENT FROM REPLY R JOIN MEM_INFO USING(MEM_NO) WHERE REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_POST_CTG = 1 AND CLIST_NO = ? ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_STATUS = 'D' WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
